channel.title: Interoperability on Community Health Toolkit
channel.description: Recent content in Interoperability on Community Health Toolkit

item.title: Building Interoperability with FHIR systems
item.description: OverviewCHT has an interoperability tool which supports building FHIR workflows. You can see more details of the tool in the cht-interoperability repository. The following FHIR resources are supported: Sending Patient data from the CHT to interoperating systems. Sending reports as Encounters with Observations from the CHT to interoperating systems. Sending Patient data created in interoperating systems to CHT applications. Sending health information represented as Encounters with Observations from interoperating systems to CHT applications.
